## IClusterClient.asScoped property

Creates a [scoped cluster client](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.iscopedclusterclient.md) bound to given [request](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.scopeablerequest.md)

